attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear , mr right honourable primeinister Brown. I'm sure you are aware of the growing increase of ASBO'S or (anti social behavior orders) i believe that the root cause of this problem is chavs. Firstly sorry for the use of the word "chav" but i have no idea how else to refer to these people. My request is simple , abolish chavs.

you can do this by making it illegal to wear certain clothes associated with chavs , ie fake burberry caps, tracksuit bottoms tooked into socks and that anyone caught wearing or doing this should be arrested or cautioned.This may seem a little strange to you , but i believe that by identifying these "chavs" and putting a stop to them we can half asbos within a year, i am willing to lead this scheme if you are willing to give it a trial.

I am well sure that i can obtain over 10, 000 signatures of people that feel the same way i do, and i feel that if i can acomplish this you should give me and the will of the british people a chance to rid this country of chavs.

Thankyou for your time

Ben Lerigo

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
